p: All solvents were of analytical grade and purchased from Sigma-Aldrich (Sigma Chemical Co., St. Louis, MO, USA): tetrahydrofuran (THF), chloroform (CHCl3), n-hexane, ethyl acetate, dimethyl sulphoxide (DMSO), isooctane, 1-butanol, α-linolenic acid (PM = 278.43 g/mol), α-tocopherol (PM = 430.72 g/mol), biliary salt of the taurodeoxycholic acid, Tween 20, dicyclohexylcarbodiimide (DCC).
